Package com.globaltcad.swingtree

Class SimpleDelegate<C extends javax.swing.JComponent,​E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.globaltcad.swingtree.SimpleDelegate<C,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - The delegate (in most cases origin UI component) type parameter stored by this.
    E - The event type parameter of the event stored by this.
    public final class SimpleDelegate<C extends javax.swing.JComponent,​E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of this are passed to action lambdas for UI components to give an action more context information.

      • find

        public final <T extends javax.swing.JComponent> java.util.Optional<T> find​(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                                                           java.lang.String id)
        Use this to query the UI tree and find any JComponent.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameter of the component which should be found.
        Parameters:
        type - The JComponent type which should be found in the swing tree.
        id - The ide of the JComponent which should be found in the swing tree.
        Returns:
        An Optional instance which may or may not contain the requested component.
